name: df-spthson
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cspthson, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), copab(s3, s4, wa(wbr(cv(s3), co(cv(s1), cfv(ctrlson, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), cv(s4)), wbr(cv(s3), cfv(cspths, cv(s0)), cv(s4)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ SPathsOn =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(Vtx ` s0), s2 ‚àà(Vtx ` s0)‚Ü¶ { < s3, s4 > |(s3[(s1[(TrailsOn ` s0)]s2)]s4 ‚àß s3[(SPaths ` s0)]s4)}))
comment: Define the collection of simple paths with particular endpoints (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Mar-2018.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2021.)
